Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-36623 affecting package docker-cli for versions less than 25.0.3-3
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-36623 affecting package docker-cli for versions less than 25.0.3-3. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package docker-cli is earlier than 25.0.3-3, affected by CVE-2024-36623
